hero.title: Master Architecture & Design with
hero.subtitle: Bridge the gap between design theory and technical mastery. Learn Revit, AutoCAD, Lumion, and more from industry professionals.

features.title: Built for the AEC Industry
features.subtitle: Specialized training for Architects, Engineers, and Construction professionals.

globalCommunity.title: Design Community
globalCommunity.description: Connect with architects and designers worldwide. Share families, details, and rendering techniques.

expertContent.title: Industry Standards
expertContent.description: Courses covering ISO 19650, local building codes, and advanced BIM workflows.

fastLearning.title: Project-Based
fastLearning.description: Learn by creating real-world projects like high-rise towers, residential villas, and parametric structures.

certificates.title: Certification
certificates.description: Earn certificates to validate your software proficiency to firms and clients.

securePlatform.title: Secure Platform
securePlatform.description: Access your project files and training history securely from anywhere.

about.title: From Blueprint to Reality
about.description: Architecture is changing. The tools are getting more complex, but the deadlines are getting tighter. CourseHub provides the technical edge you need—whether you're moving from 2D to BIM, mastering photorealistic rendering, or automating tasks with visual scripting.

points.curriculum: Workflows for Revit, Rhino, and AutoCAD
points.mentorship: Learn from licensed architects and BIM leads
points.community: Resource sharing for families and textures

showcase.title: Visualize Your Future
showcase.subtitle: Master the tools that shape the built environment.
